roleset.name: balance out, lessen the impact of

role.descr: thing whose impact we want to lessen

example.name: offset-v: with agentive subject
example.text: To offset sluggish sales growth , companies have been cutting staff , mostly through attrition , and slowing the growth in research and development spending .

example.name: offset-v: instrumental subject
example.text: Earnings at Xerox 's financial - services operations actually rose slightly , but that was largely because capital gains at Crum & Forster offset Hurricane Hugo payments and the reserves set up to cover future payments .

propbank.arg: Hurricane Hugo payments and the reserves set up to cover future payments

example.name: offset-v: passivized instrumental subject
example.text: The charges are offset in part by a gain from the sale of the company 's construction division .

propbank.arg: by a gain from the sale of the company 's construction division

example.name: offset-v: arg2 (because you are offseting forset depletion with reforestation)
example.text: The solutions they formally proposed included lead / sulfur taxes , conservation and recycling incentives , reforestation offsets , transferable pollution permits , an ecological bank to finance pollution - reduction credits , and debt - for - environment swaps .
